items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Enable users to share their workout activities with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: User can select a completed workout and share it to their social feed within the app
Shared activity displays workout type, duration, and distance
Friends can view and react to shared activities
non_functional: Feed updates within 2 seconds of posting

items.title: Friends List Management
items.description: Allow users to add, remove, and view friends in the app.
acceptance_criteria: User can search for other users by username or email
User can send and accept friend requests
User can remove friends from their list
non_functional: Secure handling of friend request data

notes: The requirement was vague; assumed core social features include activity sharing and friend management. Additional features like leaderboards or messaging may be considered later.
